Question: Lexar International CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Lexar International

Product Lineup at CES 2024

- Professional CFexpress™ 4.0 Type B Card DIAMOND Series with PCIe Gen 4, read speed of 3600MB/s, write speed of 3300MB/s
- Professional CFexpress™ 4.0 Type A Card GOLD Series with PCIe Gen 4, max. read speeds of 1800MB/s, max. write speeds of 1650MB/s
- Professional GOLD microSD™ UHS-II Card with max. read speeds of 280MB/s, max. write speeds of 180MB/s, capacities up to 256GB
- ARMOR 700 Portable SSD with max. read and write speeds of 2000MB/s
- Professional NM1090 M.2 PCIe Gen 5 NVMe™ SSD with Heatsink, max. read speeds of 12,000MB/s, max. write speeds of 11,000MB/s
- NM800 PRO M.2 2280 NVMe™ SSD with and without Heatsink, capacities up to 8TB
- PLAY M.2 2230 PCIe 4.0 SSD with max. read speeds of 5200MB/s, max. write speeds of 4700MB/s
- ARES RGB DDR5 8400MT/s

Lexar will be showcasing a range of products including cutting-edge CFexpress cards, high-performance SSDs, and blazing-fast memory modules at CES 2024.
Summary_cn:
雷克萨尔国际

2024 年 CES 产品阵容

- 专业 CFexpress™ 4.0 Type B 卡，DIAMOND 系列，采用 PCIe Gen 4，读取速度 3600MB/s，写入速度 3300MB/s。
- 专业 CFexpress™ 4.0 Type A 卡，GOLD 系列，采用 PCIe Gen 4，最大读取速度 1800MB/s，最大写入速度 1650MB/s。
- 专业 GOLD microSD™ UHS-II 卡，最大读取速度 280MB/s，最大写入速度 180MB/s，容量高达 256GB。
- ARMOR 700 便携式 SSD，最大读写速度 2000MB/s。
- 专业 NM1090 M.2 PCIe Gen 5 NVMe™ SSD，配备散热器，最大读取速度 12,000MB/s，最大写入速度 11,000MB/s。
- NM800 PRO M.2 2280 NVMe™ SSD，带散热器和无散热器两种型号，容量高达 8TB。
- PLAY M.2 2230 PCIe 4.0 SSD，最大读取速度 5200MB/s，最大写入速度 4700MB/s。
- ARES RGB DDR5 8400MT/s 内存模块。

雷克萨尔将在 2024 年 CES 展会上展示一系列前沿的 CFexpress 卡、高性能 SSD 和高速的内存模块。
